CustomField.description: Measurement of customer's installed base at the NGN level. Calculated by counting instruments that are installed, shipped, and awaiting installation, and multiply by the instrument credit assigned to each instrument model.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Measurement of customer's installed base at the NGN level. Calculated by counting instruments that are installed, shipped, and awaiting installation, and multiply by the instrument credit assigned to each instrument model.
CustomField.label: Total Instrument Credits
